author: makortel
body:
This PR updates the tracking MC validation scripts. Main features are
- Produce plots for GSF tracks introduced in #13348 
  - Note that this PR does not depend on #13348, the nonexistent histograms are (silently) ignored
- Add options to limit the set of plots produced by `makeTrackValidationPlots.py`
- Improve treatment of empty histograms to reduce the amount of warnings from ROOT
- Update `harvestTrackValidationPlots.py` to use `@trackingOnlyValidation` harvesting sequence

Tested in 8_0_0, no changes expected in standard workflows.

@rovere @VinInn
title: Update tracking MC validation scripts
